title: Hextech Repair Tool Gathering Logs
body: Im on a Mac, Downloaded the hextech repair tool because i was having problems with the patcher, but the tool is stuck on gathering logs for hours.  I opened the tool from different places and restarted my computer... still just gathering logs forever.

replies.body: That tool is probably getting stuck trying to scan your game files. If your OS doesn't give the program permission to access certain file types, it won't ever be able to finish its job. Try restarting your mac again, and this time make sure to run the HRT with admin privileges.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9zrgvniu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-11T02:36:36.622+0000)
>
> That tool is probably getting stuck trying to scan your game files. If your OS doesn't give the program permission to access certain file types, it won't ever be able to finish its job. Try restarting your mac again, and this time make sure to run the HRT with admin privileges.

I have the same problem. I did what you said. Restarted and made sure that the program had permission to change things. However, it still doesn't change from the state of 'Copying R3D logs'.

Should I open a ticket about that problem before I open another ticket about my original problem with the client?

That's where mine is getting stuck too and I can't even cancel because it just gets stuck 'cancelling...'

This all comes after I had to find a fix because the HRT itself would open above the top bar making it inaccessible.

Is there a solution to this problem as it is happening to me too. I run the hextech tool and it freezes on Gathering Logs. I've tried running as an admin and still get the same result. I'm on a PC however.
